title: `JSON.stringify()`
text: Ensure that you utilize `JSON.stringify()` to write the newly appended array object to the file `db.json` using the `writeFile()` method

title: `UUID` npm package
text: The `UUID` package can be utilized to generate unique ids for each note

title: Deploying on Render
text:
When deploying a web service on Render using `Node.js` and `Express.js` ensure that:
- "Build Command": `npm install`
- "Start Command": `node server.js`
    - When I tried deploying from `index.js`, I received errors and failed deployments
